::they roll in order to avoid fire but they are plucked in the armor 
with a lil oil coming out::

SageFirstorm-last option

Changeling-lets do it

S.Firestorm and Changeling-Jets maximum burn

::thier jets turn on and they fly up a 2 feet of the 
ground,changeling fires 4 laser shots and sagefirestorm picks up 
darkmouse,they pull up hitting alot of bushes and trees,changeling 
keeps firing but opens a com to ratrap::

Changeling-we have your friend,rattrap,were going to heal her 
up,shell be fine

Sagefirestorm-youll be ok,that fiend wont hurt you,i wouldnt suggest 
sprawling,were pretty high in the air

::sagefirestorm pulls out a tranchiulaizer and pumps it in here,it 
would give him a good while so he could bring her to the base to talk 
with her,yet still keep the location a secret::
